pacman.game

Class GameView

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • pacman.game.GameView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable

    public final class GameView
extends javax.swing.JComponent
    This class is the view that displays the game. The only thing contestants might need to know about are the helper methods that allow one to add colours and lines to the game view. This could be useful for debugging.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
